channel.title: How do you make people loose items when you die
channel.description: Hello i am wondereing how i can make people keep 3 items and lloose the rest when they can someone please help me thank you

item.title: How do you make people loose items when you die
item.dc:creator: @Failurescape Failurescape
item.source: How do you make people loose items when you die

item.title: How do you make people loose items when you die
item.dc:creator: @SirPali SirPali
item.description:
@SirPali wrote:

[quote=“The Chubby Bunny, post:2, topic:330229”]Use a for statement to remove the items from every slot except the first three:

for(int i = 4; i < 28; i++) {
//code here
}

Idk if your base already has a method to remove items by slots, if not, you could make one.[/quote]

Eh. So this removes all items exept the first 3 in the inventory.
Lame. What if you have 3 logs, and 25 gs. LOL BYEBYE GS!

Anyway, I’m sure there are tutorials on this. Check out the tutorial section.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you make people loose items when you die

item.title: How do you make people loose items when you die
item.dc:creator: @The_Chubby_Bunny The Chubby Bunny
item.description:
@The_Chubby_Bunny wrote:

Use a for statement to remove the items from every slot except the first three:

for(int i = 4; i < 28; i++) {
//code here
}

Idk if your base already has a method to remove items by slots, if not, you could make one.
